GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves all columns of plus a count of comments received for a single article with requested id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all associated comments a single requested article

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Takes a username and body and adds a comment with the associated article_id. Username is saveds as author and body as body. Returns the comment.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Takes an inc_votes number property and adjusts votes column of the article with the correct article_id according to the value. Returns the updated article.

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment with the chosen ID. Does not return any content.
